statements: SELECT * FROM rental_prices WHERE season = 'Summer';
SELECT rental_price FROM rental_prices WHERE property_id = 123 AND season = 'Winter';
SELECT property_id, rental_price FROM rental_prices WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM rental_prices WHERE rental_price BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT id FROM rental_prices WHERE property_id = 456 AND (season = 'Spring' OR season = 'Fall');
SELECT rental_price, season FROM rental_prices WHERE property_id = 123 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM rental_prices WHERE property_id = 456 AND season = 'Summer'
SELECT property_id, MAX(rental_price) AS max_price FROM rental_prices GROUP BY property_id ORDER BY max_price DESC
SELECT AVG(rental_price) AS avg_price, season FROM rental_prices GROUP BY season HAVING AVG(rental_price) > 1000
SELECT * FROM rental_prices WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM peak_rental_prices
SELECT rental_location, peak_season_price FROM peak_rental_prices ORDER BY peak_season_price DESC
SELECT rental_id, rental_location, peak_season_price FROM peak_rental_prices WHERE peak_season_price > 100
SELECT rental_id, rental_location FROM peak_rental_prices WHERE rental_location = 'Beachfront'
SELECT * FROM off_peak_rental_prices ORDER BY off_peak_season_price ASC
SELECT rental_location, peak_season_price FROM peak_rental_prices WHERE peak_season_price > 1000 ORDER BY rental_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM off_peak_rental_prices WHERE off_peak_season_price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY rental_location DESC;
SELECT rental_id, rental_location, peak_season_price FROM peak_rental_prices WHERE rental_location LIKE 'Ma%' ORDER BY peak_season_price DESC;
SELECT rental_id, rental_location, off_peak_season_price FROM off_peak_rental_prices WHERE rental_location = 'New York' ORDER BY off_peak_season_price DESC;
SELECT rental_id, rental_location, SUM(peak_season_price) AS total_peak_price FROM peak_rental_prices GROUP BY rental_location ORDER BY total_peak_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM rental_prices ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT property_id, rental_price FROM rental_prices WHERE rental_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM peak_periods WHERE start_date >= '2022-06-01' AND end_date <= '2022-07-31';
SELECT property_id, rental_price FROM rental_prices WHERE rental_price > 1000;
SELECT property_id, rental_price, rental_date FROM rental_prices ORDER BY rental_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM rental_prices WHERE rental_price > 1000 ORDER BY property_id DESC
SELECT property_id, rental_date FROM rental_prices WHERE rental_price < 500 ORDER BY rental_date ASC
SELECT property_id, rental_date FROM rental_prices WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM peak_periods WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY period_id ASC
SELECT period_id, start_date, end_date FROM off_peak_periods WHERE start_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT * FROM peak_prices WHERE price > 1000
SELECT location, price FROM peak_prices WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT location, peak_period_start, peak_period_end FROM peak_prices WHERE location LIKE 'S%'
SELECT property_id, rental_date, is_peak_period FROM rental_history WHERE is_peak_period = TRUE ORDER BY rental_date
SELECT property_type, number_of_bedrooms, location FROM property_details WHERE number_of_bedrooms >= 3 AND property_type = 'Apartment'
SELECT * FROM peak_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, price FROM off_peak_prices WHERE off_peak_period_start < '2023-01-01' AND off_peak_period_end > '2022-06-30';
SELECT rental_id, rental_price, is_peak_period FROM rental_history WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_type, location, number_of_bedrooms FROM property_details WHERE number_of_bedrooms >= 3 AND number_of_bathrooms = 2;
SELECT location, price, peak_period_start, peak_period_end FROM peak_prices WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM properties;
SELECT property_id, property_name, location FROM properties WHERE property_type = 'Apartment';
SELECT property_id, property_name, rental_price FROM peak_rental_prices ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT property_id, property_name, location FROM properties WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%';
SELECT season_name, start_date, end_date FROM seasons WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-09-01';
SELECT * FROM properties
SELECT property_name, property_type, location FROM properties
SELECT property_name, rental_price FROM properties JOIN peak_rental_prices ON properties.property_id = peak_rental_prices.property_id
SELECT property_name, rental_price FROM properties JOIN off_peak_rental_prices ON properties.property_id = off_peak_rental_prices.property_id

SELECT properties.property_name, peak_rental_prices.rental_price, seasons.season_name FROM properties JOIN peak_rental_prices ON properties.property_id = peak_rental_prices.property_id JOIN seasons ON peak_rental_prices.peak_season_start = seasons.start_date
